_sText:
Jb_Stronghold_Mc

Welcome, this is my new minecraft jailbreak map, where I have tried to introduce a unique idea to give the gamemode some more objective. Dont be afraid by the spawn, you start in the 'shop' but will soon be teleported to the cell area.

	UPDATE: Beta_1 
Changelog

- Fixed DeathRope continuity issue 
- Fixed Bunnyhop Safespot
- Fixed Medic mechanics
- Fixed warmode death teleport
- Fixed Tower Defence T kill trigger
- Fixed invisibility glitch (Unload knifedrop mods)
- Fixed Tower Defence knife spam
- Updated textures 
- Reduced Wheat Chat-Spam
- Added TNT pickup notification
- Added Pickaxe, Tower Defence & Shop instructions
- Removed Creeper friendly-fire
- Added crash exploitation protection
- Added Climb Area





	**Map Features**

- Item Shop, with Diamond Currency
- Crafting Abilities (Create TNT, Pickaxes and more)
- Harvest-able wheat and pork to make Medic function
- Mining!
- Cavern Bunnyhopping
- DeathRope
- Nether
- DiamondTheft
- War Mode
- Tower Defence Mode
- And much more soon!


**Diamond Currency Explained**


**How CT gain Diamonds**

Both teams start with no diamonds
Diamonds have to be obtained by ordering a **terrorist** to mine diamonds hidden around the map
Diamonds mined will be added to the CT sides DiamondCount on the next round
Diamonds allow you to get better special items

**How T gain Diamonds**

Diamonds mined go to the Nether Vault
Terrorists have to get to the vault and steal the diamonds
Only 1 diamond can fit in each cart or they will fall out
